page.title: 19RELIGION PAGE 2
page.content:
We go to Holy Trinity Sunday School at 11.00 am.We give our collection and then we sit and listen to the story.On Prize Giving we get a book or something and after a year we get a book called Quest.
Everyday my sister Shahid, and I go to the Mosque.When we get there we take our shoes off and wash our hands and faces.Then we read, bismilla irahma nrahma nirah hiem, then we open the Quran. We read a page each day.I have read the Quran one time and I am on nine sapara.The Quran has thirty saparas {chapters}.My sister Samina is on second sapara and my brother Shahid s on first Patti{pre book}.After we've read it, we read to our teacher,when we've read it,we get our shoes on and go home. We have a day off on Fridays.
